name: Schkreyvb (Game Jam: Relationships)
description: The idea for this game was to test the relationship between the players. This was achieved because both players have to work in unison in order to achieve a good lap time. However, this is a racing game, even though the players are always within 5 meters of each other, this means that at any point either racer can try to use the momentum of the rope to propel them across the line first.
